root.name: Redneck Rampage Rides Again: Arkansas
root.description: MusicMuch like the first game, Redneck Rampage Rides Again: Arkansas contains an eclectic selection of psychobilly songs from bands such as Mojo Nixon, The Sofa Kings, John Scmocker and Howard Yearwood.Track 01: Data TrackTrack 02: Mojo Nixon - Redneck Rampage (3:41)Track 03: John Scmocker and Howard Yearwood - Stanky's Blues (1:44)Track 04: John Scmocker and Howard YearwoodTrack 05: Mojo Nixon - Cybersex (3:39)Track 06: Mojo Nixon The Toadliquors - Pickin' Again (0:50)Track 07: Tiny D The Sofa Kings - Disgraceland (2:55)Track 08: John Scmocker and Howard Yearwood - She's A Good'ns (1:35)Track 09: John Scmocker and Howard Yearwood - Duelin' Banjos (1:53)Track 10: Bonus Track (1:13)
